item.description:
How about a Sunday afternoon Hockey game meetup? A meetup is being planned to see the Lowell
Devils play the Portland Pirates on Sunday, 1/13/07 at a mid-afternoon game. Possibly meet for lunch
before hand. TBD where at a later date, after we have an idea of how many are interested.

Here are the details:

Who: Lowell Devils vs. Portland Pirates
Where: Tsongas Arena in Lowell, MA
Date: 1/13/07 Sunday afternoon
Game time: 4:05pm
Meetup location: TBD! Lunch place undecided at this time. Will update later.
Hosts/Contacts: Karen Jackson (tendronee @comcast.net) or 603-759-7845
Chuck Provost (chuck345@yahoo.com)
Price per Individual: $18.00 per seat/ticket
Group prices: If we are able to get 20 people to attend, our cost would be $10-15.00 per seat.
RSVP DEADLINE: 12/22/07
TICKETS MUST BE PAID IN ADVANCE...WE ARE PAYING FOR THE TICKETS OUT OF OUR POCKETS, SO if you RSVP YES..you will be asked to send your $$$ in for the ticket and THEN receive the ticket from us via mail, or handed to you at the game/meetup whichever you prefer.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Sunday Hockey: Lowell Devils vs. Portland Pirates
